data.title: Kurt Vonnegut Remembered
data.meta_description: A collection of reminiscences that illuminate the career and private life of the iconic author of 'Slaughterhouse-Five'   Kurt Vonnegut (1922–2007), who b...

Jim O’Loughlin is associate professor of English at the University of Northern Iowa. He is the coauthor of Daily Life in the Industrial United States, 1870–1900.
